channel.title: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 126)
channel.description:
whonix 9.6 , tester repository , one of the whonixcheck lines:-
[code]WARNING: Debian Package Update Check Result: Could not check for the software updates! (apt-get code: 126) please manually check: (open a terminal, start menu -> Applications -> System -> Terminal.)[/code]
why this message appears ? also there is no one update or upgrade when i check by sudo apt-get update & dist-upgrade?!
[img]http://s2.postimg.org/nbm8watmv/code_126.jpg[/img]

item.title: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 126)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
AppArmor bug that will be fixed in next testers-only version.

Read full topic
item.source: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 126)
